name: Tank Control (Brain Digger)
description:
A project done for The Kadar Game Center, Shenkar as part of the Game Design and Development training program.

Tank Control is and old-school top view tank battling game. Each player controls a tank and tries to control as much land as possible. When the timer reaches zero - the player who controls most of the land wins.

NOTE: PLEASE GO TO THE OPTIONS MENU AND SET THE CONTROLS BEFORE PLAYING. The game supports keyboard and gamepads simultaneously.
